lead.title: CORE The Economy
lead.text: A modern open source basic economics textbook

sections.title: project description
sections.text: The Economy is a opens ource textbook developed by CORE. This project's intent is to create stand alone Android and iOS applications to make the book available to students offline.

sections.title: my role
sections.text: I was approached as a technical specialist to create a workflow and implement technology to publish the content as a mobile application.

sections.title: technology
sections.text: The project uses node and cordova to build the html content into working signed applications.

sections.title: client
sections.text: Electric Book Works is an award winning design studio that specialises in the design and publications of physical and digital books.

sections.title: current status
sections.text: With over 10 000 downloads on the play store the application is in daily use around the world.
